content:
C2-62- 2388
MEMORANDUM
August 2, 2
本件保存七年
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg Program Officer, US AID/C
From 6. G. Chang
Original signed by Chief, Second Division J. C. Tseng Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies of Sbc letter SDC-5472 dated July 27, 1962 and MKA letter MK-1569 dated July 25, 1962.
In the above letter, SDC requested that 4 compressors be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. Copies of SDC/MKA letters cc: (with copies of SDC/MKA letters) SDC BES 2D
E-16. 13. 2
51. 3. 100×200
@216 Academia Historica
62

Original signed by Chief, Second Division J. C. Tseng Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies of Sbc letter SDC-5472 dated July 27, 1962 and MKA letter MK-1569 dated July 25, 1962.
In the above letter, SDC requested that 4 compressors be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. Copies of SDC/MKA letters cc: (with copies of SDC/MKA letters) SDC BES 2D
